name: Wasted Ammo Proto
description:
A project done for my Game Programming 2 class, tasked with making an "infinite runner"

This Cat Commando has found the best way to navigate this neon landscape is with ammo. Lots and Lots of ammo.

WASD to move between 3 rows and 3 columns. Pick up ammo resupplies (green balls) and if you get hurt, Extra Lives (red balls). If the walls are too close to move, use Spacebar to fire out a shot (but consume a bit if your ammo)
